column5: To all my American friends. I hope you all have a great family day, lots of food and enough money to get you through the sales everywhere.
THATS TRUE ROY HAPPY THANKSGIVING TO OUR GUYS TO THE SOUTH !!!! make sure you eat a big turkey dinner today so you have energy for the malls tommorow on black friday !!! cheers
Happy Thanksgiving to all and here's some thing speacial for my friend Bil'wii , go buy your self some thing nice and don't say i never gave you nuf'fen ........ happy thanksgiving Harold .
Happy Thanksgiving and God Bless you all !!!    and You too my Fav Americain cousin Mr Hauser.
A Very Happy Thanksgiving to all of our friends. Hope your day if filled with fun and turkey!
That ye friends.   Heading out shortly to our daughter's place in Pittsburgh for what should be a very fine meal.  I think I'll be bypassing all the "Black Friday" chaos and spend a day at work.

Right now as we type I am in the kitchen cooking the stuffing and the sweet potatoes for a trip over to Joes house. Thanks to all also for the  well wishes and we all have a lot to be thankful for and one that is at the top of my list are my friends here at OFC.   Art

I say Thank you to all my fine Canadian friends.   I only wish I was as thoughtful on your Thankgiving.  Art, I am also working on the stuffing and sweets letting my better half sleep in.  As far as black friday goes  :wallbash:  I won't be out there.   This year is a concerted effort to buy American or Canadian.
Happy Thanksgiving to our American friends!! Enjoy your time together with family and friends.
